<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_snc_amazon_echo_intent"> <x_snc_amazon_echo_intent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <always_available>false</always_available> <category/> <fallback>true</fallback> <intent_ends_session>false</intent_ends_session> <keyword>Help</keyword> <name>Help</name> <next_intent/> <order>2000</order> <output_speech_format>PlainText</output_speech_format> <reprompt_speech_format/> <script><![CDATA[(function(current, content, attributes, ER, IntentUtils){ var arr = []; var intentArray = new x_snc_amazon_echo.IntentUtils().getOrderedTopLevelIntentArrayNames();
var msg = ""; msg += "The following commands are available: ";
for (var i = 0; i < intentArray.length; i++) { if (i == intentArray.length - 1) msg += "and '" + intentArray[i] + "'. "; else msg += "'" + intentArray[i] + "', ";
}
ER.setOutputSpeech(current.output_speech_format, msg, ""); ER.setEnd(current.intent_ends_session);
result = ER.response; //Required })(current, content, attributes, new EchoResponseBuilder(), new IntentUtils());]]></script> <slot_name_1/> <slot_name_2/> <slot_name_3/> <slot_type_1/> <slot_type_2/> <slot_type_3/> <sys_created_by>jc</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-03-06 03:43:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>09c5b64edb5db200d1a9f1351d96198b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>jc</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-04-19 16:35:20</sys_updated_on> <top_level_intent>true</top_level_intent> </x_snc_amazon_echo_intent> </record_update>
